channel.title: Chances of being banned?
channel.description: I was wondering if i used a bcel bot for about 6-8 hours a day with anti-randoms and anti-ban if i could get banned? Would the chances be extremely high or low? I am going with you guys will say 50/50 but i want to get 91 rc but i dont want to have to craft 745k runes to get there. So i was going to bot and do it.

item.title: Chances of being banned?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Cowie`, post:21, topic:200655”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=265287.msg2210893#msg2210893 date=1209870691]

I was wondering if i used a bcel bot for about 6-8 hours a day with anti-randoms and anti-ban if i could get banned? Would the chances be extremely high or low? I am going with you guys will say 50/50 but i want to get 91 rc but i dont want to have to craft 745k runes to get there. So i was going to bot and do it.

What bot would you use to runecraft anyway? I’m kinda interested in this.
[/quote]

Any bot that is capable of running from edge to the abyss > go to center of abyss > enter alter > craft > tele > repeat.[/quote]
Would have to be a pretty flawless bot. Would be much easier to make, oh say an air crafter.

Read full topic

dude somes facts some of my friends took show 2 out of 3 bots are banned
no matter how good
(i didn’t take facts!!! it was my friends so dont flame me)
also i wouldnt take the risk

says you… I wrote a shit script on rsbot to power mine and i have 50 mining without being banned so far lol.
